Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION
REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Provides test preparation for certain students intending to apply to take the specialized high school admissions test
Summary: Provides test preparation for students in the seventh grade having scored no higher than a four on either the English language arts or mathematics test intending to apply to take the specialized high school admissions test.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to test preparation programs for certain students
